summary: Adds a static DoF effect to intensify the effect.
descriptionHtml:
UPDATE: As there has been some changes as to how imagespace modifiers work, this mod will be joining [url=file.php?id=11479]CLO - Custom Lighting Overlay[/url]
I will keep this page open for now but all new updates and settings will be on CLO.
Sry about this and hope you find the Magic Bug.


DOF - Depth of Field
DOF Light - Lighter effect, further view distance, smoother gradient


It\'s a simple mod that will add a static depth of field effect to increase the vanilla effect look.
Principle is similar to the FNV version and shouldn\'t be performance heavy.
This is the first version and i will tweak some more as time goes by.

INSTALL: Extract, enable, play
UNINSTALL: Delete DOF.esp
COMPATIBILITY: Will work with everything i can think of.. (except CLO for now)
PERFROMANCE HIT: Low

VERSION:
0.2 - Added script that wasn\'t in archive.
author: fLokii
